name: @politie/informant
description: Informant is a simple and fast logging library for Node.js and browser JavaScript applications.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm test && npm run bundle
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run tsc && nyc --check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches -1 --statements 100 --reporter text-summary --reporter lcov --include "dist/**/*.js" --exclude "**/*.spec.js" mocha --forbid-only "dist/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.ci:travis: npm run build && cat coverage/lcov.info | node_modules/.bin/coveralls
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec npm run watch:run
scripts.watch:run: nyc --reporter html --reporter text-summary --extension .ts --include "src/**/*.ts" --exclude "src/**/*.spec.ts" mocha --reporter landing --compilers ts:ts-node/register "src/**/*.spec.ts" && rimraf .nyc_output

author: Dutch National Police
